sentences.en: He was a callow youth when he joined the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 他进报社时还是个乳臭未干的小子.

sentences.en: He was only a callow youth.
sentences.cn: 他只是个无经验的年轻人.

sentences.en: I believed a lot of things in my callow youth that I do not believe now.
sentences.cn: 在我年轻尚无经验时相信的许多事情,现在我不相信了.

sentences.en: Like callow birds left desert to the skies.
sentences.cn: 你的庇护,它们就要战栗--就象/那羽翼未丰的小鸟给撇下在天空里.

sentences.en: Thin - walled cells of callow stirpe's cortex contain saliferous vacuoles, and pulp cells contain crystals. "
sentences.cn: 幼茎皮层薄壁细胞中含有含盐液泡泡, 髓细胞中含有晶体.

words.tran_cn: 年轻而无经验的；[鸟]羽毛未丰的

trans.tran_cn: 羽翼未丰的，幼小的，<文>稚嫩的，乳臭未干的
trans.tran_en: A callow young person has very little experience or knowledge of the way they should behave as an adult
